data.name: Summon: Ancient Spirit
data.description: Summons an Ancient Spirit for 30s and grants Four Elements status. The Ancient Spirit faces a target within 20m and uses a skill which deals {se_dmg:1625000111:SkillUIMinDmgsum}-{se_dmg:1625000111:SkillUIMaxDmgsum} damage to up to 4 enemies. After using the skill, it continues fighting using basic attacks and reuses its skill after 7 basic attacks. It is dismissed upon selecting the summon icon. Each skill level increases the Spirit's Attack, Defense, Accuracy, and Critical Hit by 2%. 20 Stagger Gauge Damage
